Author: robertgaal
Title: Got schwag? Submit your start-up's own merchandise on this blog

Author: immad
Content: I don't see many people being discouraged to make social apps. A lot of the internet is based on social interaction (forums, comments, reviews, chats..) and wherever there is spam there are anti spam-measure in place that work reasonably well since these apps are all pretty usable. Maybe I just don't get what you mean
